name: mongo-analyser
description: A tool that is not keyhole

scripts.create: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.build-mac-m1: npm run build && pkg -t node16-macos-arm64 ./lib/index.js -c package.json --options max-old-space-size=8152 -o build/mongo-analyser-macos-arm64
scripts.build-mac-intel: npm run build && pkg -t node16-macos-x64 ./lib/index.js -c package.json --options max-old-space-size=8152 -o build/mongo-analyser-macos-x64

author: Gobind Singh
